name: Software Development
description: Designing, coding, testing, and maintaining software applications and systems.

name: Data Science
description: Analyzing and interpreting complex data sets to inform business decision-making.

name: Marketing
description: Promoting and selling products or services through advertising and strategic campaigns.

name: Human Resources
description: Managing personnel, recruitment, employee relations, and organizational development.

name: Finance
description: Handling financial transactions, budgeting, forecasting, and financial analysis.

name: Healthcare
description: Providing medical care, treatment, and support to individuals and communities.

name: Education
description: Instructing and educating students at various levels in different subjects.

name: Customer Service
description: Assisting customers, resolving inquiries, and ensuring a positive customer experience.

name: Sales
description: Selling products or services, managing client relationships, and achieving sales targets.

name: Engineering
description: Designing, developing, and maintaining infrastructure, products, or systems.

name: IT Support
description: Providing technical assistance, troubleshooting, and resolving IT-related issues.

name: Project Management
description: Planning, executing, and closing projects, ensuring they meet organizational goals.

name: Legal
description: Advising on legal matters, drafting contracts, and representing clients in legal proceedings.

name: Architecture
description: Designing and planning the construction of buildings and structures.

name: Graphic Design
description: Creating visual concepts and designs for various media to communicate a message.

name: Social Work
description: Assisting individuals and communities in need, providing social services and support.

name: Environmental Science
description: Studying and addressing environmental issues and promoting sustainable practices.

name: Manufacturing
description: Overseeing the production of goods, ensuring efficiency and quality standards are met.

name: Aerospace
description: Designing, testing, and maintaining aircraft and spacecraft.

name: Fashion Design
description: Creating clothing and accessories, staying updated on fashion trends.
